result.html: An mbeidh deoch eile agatWill you have another drink?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ deoċ eile agatWill you have another drink?

result.eng: Will you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.orig: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.html: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú fós ṫart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?

result.html: Ar mhaith leat deoch eileWould you like another drink?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat deoċ eileWould you like another drink?

result.eng: I found out that he has another woman!
result.ga: Fuair mé amach go bhfuil bean eile aige
result.orig: Fuair mé amach go bhfuil bean eile aige
result.html: Fuair mé amach go bhfuil bean eile aigeI found out that he has another woman!
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé amaċ go ḃfuil bean eile aigeI found out that he has another woman!

result.eng: It will take another four years.
result.html: Glacfaidh sé ceithre bliana eileIt will take another four years.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sé ceiṫre bliana eileIt will take another four years.

result.eng: You are expecting another child, aren't you?
result.ga: Tá sibh ag súil le páiste eile nach bhfuil
result.orig: Tá sibh ag súil le páiste eile nach bhfuil
result.html: Tá sibh ag súil le páiste eile nach bhfuilYou are expecting another child, aren't you?
result.ponchtml: Tá siḃ ag súil le páiste eile naċ ḃfuilYou are expecting another child, aren't you?

result.eng: That one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ga: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.orig: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.html: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin imiṫe ċeana féin aċ tá ceann eile ann ag ceaṫrú ċun a dó ḋéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ga: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.orig: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.html: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic TheasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ponchtml: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic ṪeasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.

result.eng: He found another person who had flying experience.
result.ga: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.orig: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.html: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.
result.ponchtml: D'aimsiġ sé duine eile a raiḃ taiṫí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.

result.eng: He drank another gulp from it.
result.html: Bhain sé slogóg eile asHe drank another gulp from it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sé slogóg eile asHe drank another gulp from it.
